sense.gloss: to descend, to go down, to come down
to be handed down (of an order, judgment, etc.)
to be less than, to be inferior to
to have the runs, to have diarrhea
to pass (in stool), to be discharged from the body
to depreciate oneself, to be humble

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑敵↑↓てき↓の↑上↑↓じょう↓に↑天罰↑↓てんばつ↓が↑下↑↓|くだ↓る|ことを↑祈↑↓いの↓った。
sdata.e: They called down the wrath of God upon the heads of their enemies.

sdata.j: ↑梨↑↓なし↓や↑柿↑↓かき↓を↑食↑↓た↓べ↑過↑↓す↓ぎるとお↑腹↑↓なか↓が↑下↑↓|くだ↓る|ことがあるので、↑食↑↓た↓べ↑過↑↓す↓ぎには↑注意↑↓ちゅうい↓しましょう。
sdata.e: If you eat too many pears and persimmons you can become sick, so be cautious to not eat too much.

sdata.j: この↑辺↑↓あた↓りで↑家賃↑↓やちん↓が↑５↑↓ご↓↑万↑↓まん↓↑円↑↓えん↓を↑下↑↓|くだ↓る|ことはまずありませんよ。
sdata.e: You'll be unlikely to find any rent that's under ₤300 in this area.
